mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEM(MEM_NO, ID, PW, PHONE, EMAIL, EMAIL_CONFIRM, NAME, TELCOM, NIC, INTRO, BIRTH, SEX, KEYWORD_NO, MARKETING, JOIN_DATE, KEYWORD) VALUES(MEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{inputID}, #{inputPW}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{inputCode}, #{inputName}, #{selectTelcom} ,#{inputNic}, #{inputIntro}, #{birth}, #{sex}, #{selectKeyword}, #{marketing}, SYSDATE, #{inputKeyword})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEM SET PW = #{inputPW} WHERE MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, PW, SUBSTR(PHONE, 4, 11)AS PHONE , SUBSTR(EMAIL, 1, INSTR(EMAIL, '@')-1) AS EMAIL, SUBSTR(EMAIL, INSTR(EMAIL, '@')+1) AS DOMAIN, NAME, TO_CHAR(BIRTH, 'YYYY') AS YEAR, SUBSTR(MONTH, 1, INSTR(MONTH, '월')-1) AS MONTH, TO_CHAR(BIRTH, 'DD') AS DAY, SEX, KEYWORD_NO, KEYWORD, TELCOM FROM (SELECT M.*, TO_CHAR(BIRTH, 'MON') AS MONTH FROM MEM M) WHERE MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEM SET ACC_CNT = ACC_CNT+1, LAST_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO}
UPDATE MEM SET PHOTO_PATH = #{photoPath}, NIC = #{inputNic}, INTRO = #{inputIntro} WHERE MEM_NO = #{MEM_NO}
